name: artifact
description: ## PRE-STEPS - Pull the image `docker pull sonatype/nexus3` - Run the container `docker run -d -p 8081:8081 --name nexus-container sonatype/nexus3` - Get the password `docker exec -it nexus-container cat /nexus-data/admin.password` - Go to the http://localhost:8081 and change the password for the admin to be able to use the script
